question:
Point S is 14 m towards the West of point P. Point Q is 4 m towards the South of point S. Point U is 9 m towards the South of point S. Point T is 7 m towards the East of point Q. Point R is 4 m towards the North of point T. Point V is 4 m towards the South of point P.
Which of the following points are in a straight line?

Point S is 14 m towards the West of point P. Point Q is 4 m towards the South of point S. Point U is 9 m towards the South of point S. Point T is 7 m towards the East of point Q. Point R is 4 m towards the North of point T. Point V is 4 m towards the South of point P.
P is in which direction with respect to R?

Point S is 14 m towards the West of point P. Point Q is 4 m towards the South of point S. Point U is 9 m towards the South of point S. Point T is 7 m towards the East of point Q. Point R is 4 m towards the North of point T. Point V is 4 m towards the South of point P.
If a person walks 5 m towards North from point U and then takes a right turn, then which of the following points would he reach first?
